document.masterDocTitle: Reclassification of the North Temperate Taxa Associated with Staphylinus Sensu Lato, Including Comments on Relevant Subtribes of Staphylinini (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

The following Palearctic species of
Staphylinus sensu
lato, unknown to us at present, cannot be placed with certainty in the new concepts of genera and/or subgenera. They are listed alphabetically (by species) in the original combination:

paragraph.taxonomicName: Ocypus ( Neotasgius ) harbinensis Li and Chen, 1993
Ocypus ( Neotasgius ) liaoningensis Li and Chen, 1993
